statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT provider_name, license_number FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE license_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, issuing_authority FROM healthcare_provider_credentials ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE issuing_authority = 'Medical Board';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, blockchain_hash FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE license_expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT provider_name, license_number, issuing_authority FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE license_expiry_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY provider_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE issuing_authority = 'California Board of Medicine' ORDER BY license_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, license_expiry_date FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE license_expiry_date < '2023-01-01' AND issuing_authority LIKE '%Medical%' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;

SELECT provider_name, license_number, issuing_authority, license_expiry_date FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE issuing_authority IN ('California Board of Nursing', 'New York Board of Health') ORDER BY license_expiry_date DESC;

SELECT provider_name, license_expiry_date, blockchain_hash FROM healthcare_provider_credentials WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM doctor_credentials WHERE doctor_id = 1001
SELECT name, specialization FROM doctor_credentials ORDER BY specialization ASC
SELECT doctor_id, name, license_number, blockchain_hash FROM doctor_credentials WHERE specialization = 'Cardiologist'
SELECT * FROM license_verification WHERE verification_date >= '2022-01-01' AND validity_status = true
SELECT verification_id, doctor_id, verification_date, verified_by FROM license_verification ORDER BY verification_date DESC
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization FROM doctor_credentials ORDER BY specialization DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM doctor_credentials WHERE license_number LIKE '%123%' AND blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL;

SELECT doctor_id, name, license_number, verification_date FROM doctor_credentials INNER JOIN license_verification ON doctor_credentials.doctor_id = license_verification.doctor_id WHERE validity_status = TRUE ORDER BY verification_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctor_id, name, blockchain_hash FROM doctor_credentials WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' OR specialization = 'Neurology';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization, blockchain_status FROM doctor_credentials WHERE blockchain_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, license_number FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT credential_type, credential_description, issue_date FROM credentials;
SELECT provider_id, blockchain_hash FROM blockchain_verification WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY license_exp_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE license_exp_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, license_number FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, credential_type FROM healthcare_providers JOIN credentials ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = credentials.provider_id;
SELECT provider_name, credential_description FROM healthcare_providers JOIN credentials ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = credentials.provider_id WHERE issue_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT provider_id, blockchain_hash FROM healthcare_providers JOIN blockchain_verification ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = blockchain_verification.provider_id ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM provider_credentials;
SELECT license_number, verification_date FROM provider_credentials WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT provider_id, email, phone_number FROM provider_contacts ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT license_number, is_valid FROM license_status WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT provider_name FROM provider_credentials JOIN provider_contacts ON provider_credentials.id = provider_contacts.provider_id WHERE provider_contacts.email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM provider_credentials LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, provider_name, verification_date FROM provider_credentials WHERE blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT provider_id, transaction_id, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT license_number, is_valid, issued_date, expiry_date FROM license_status WHERE is_valid = true;
SELECT provider_id, email, phone_number, address FROM provider_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM provider_credentials;
SELECT provider_name, license_number, certification_type, provider_id FROM provider_credentials;
SELECT provider_name, certification_date, blockchain_hash, license_number FROM provider_credentials ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, certification_type, certification_date FROM provider_credentials WHERE certification_type = 'Medical';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, license_number FROM provider_credentials WHERE provider_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM provider_credentials ORDER BY provider_id ASC;
SELECT provider_name, certification_type, certification_date FROM provider_credentials WHERE certification_type = 'Professional';
SELECT provider_name, license_number, issue_date, expiration_date FROM provider_credentials pc JOIN license_history lh ON pc.license_number = lh.license_number;

SELECT pc.provider_name, pc.license_number, lh.issue_date, lh.expiration_date, la.agency_name FROM provider_credentials pc JOIN license_history lh ON pc.license_number = lh.license_number JOIN certification_agencies la ON pc.provider_id = la.agency_id;

SELECT pc.provider_name, pc.blockchain_hash, bc.transaction_id, bc.block_hash FROM provider_credentials pc JOIN blockchain_ledger bc ON pc.blockchain_hash = bc.previous_hash ORDER BY bc.block_id DESC;
